aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.aboutme: Hello, I’m Gerson Lamela, a {age} Fullstack Developer with expertise in building fast, scalable, and user-centric web applications. I work extensively with React, Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and Node.js. I am passionate about solving complex problems, adopting new technologies, and delivering innovative solutions. Outside of work, I dedicate time to personal projects and continuous learning to further enhance my skills.

desc.1: Design and development of interactive multimedia products
desc.2: Capture, digitization, and processing of images, audio, and text
desc.3: Content editing to create effective communication solutions
desc.4: Integration of multimedia elements using authoring tools

desc.6: Technical support for digital and IT-related issues

systemPOS.title: System POS
systemPOS.description: This project was developed as part of my final undergraduate Multimedia Engineering thesis, where I achieved a final grade of 19/20.
